content: They promote authoritarian leaders, and they fan the flames of political violence that are a threat to our personal rights, to the pursuit of justice, to the rule of law, to the very soul of this country.
translations: ita:Promuovono leader autoritari, e soffiano sulle fiamme di una violenza politica che sono una minaccia per i nostri diritt
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by shekitten (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
